## Reflection across $x$-axis

:::: {.columns }
::: {.column width="60%"}
$$
    \boxed{
        \begin{align*}
            \cos(\pi - \theta) & = - \cos\theta \\
            \sin(\pi - \theta) & = \phantom{-} \sin \theta
        \end{align*}}
$$
